name: Enveloop
headline: Design and send messages from your app with a simple API.
description: A developer-focused message builder and API that makes it easy to send emails and texts from your app using one simple implementation. We’re doing for mailer libraries what Prisma does for ORMs.

# Design, host, and send emails and texts. 
# All from one place - with a simple API. 
Effective communication across multiple platforms and formats is complicated, frustrating, and time-consuming to get right. Enveloop makes it a simple API call.
[Start Using Enveloop](http://www.enveloop.com/<https:/app.enveloop.com>)[Sign In](http://www.enveloop.com/<https:/app.enveloop.com>)
![Enveloop Template Builder UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/65b3e14f5d0635b6076ad8df_mockup-02.png)
## DESIGN
## Design with Ease.
Whether you start fresh or use some of our beautifully designed templates, Enveloop's fast, responsive & visual UI and thoughtfully-built components make it enjoyable to create emails and texts that are guaranteed to work.Plus, we've included developer-friendly formatting options, including full **Markdown** support and **Mustache** for dynamic content.
![Component Puzzle Piece Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64ee0be956d6335e58694c14_design-icon-11.svg)
#### Easy-to-Add Components
Enveloop includes numerous useful section layouts and components that make building out emails effortless. Add them to your message out of the box or customize to fit your needs.
![Template Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64ee0b89a609c0a4c41976a1_design-icon-12.svg)
#### Pre-designed Templates
From basic light and dark modes to artistic and colorful, Enveloop allows you to start creating messages as soon as you sign up!
![Curly Bracket Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64ee0b893060781430d17f48_design-icon-13.svg)
#### Dynamic Content
Included with powerful editing and content control, you can quickly add dynamic variables to your templates and see how that content would render for your users. 
## DEVELOPMENT
## Built for developers. Used by everyone.
A powerful, but simple-to-use API is at the heart of everything we've built into Enveloop. This enables developers, and entire development teams, to not only remove unnecessary messaging code/cruft from their repos, but also reduce unneeded deploys for small content updates.Enveloop is a high-visibility content management UI & editor for all your email and text messaging. Add as many team members and projects as you need!
![A circle with lines emanating from it -- showing how the Enveloop API makes it easy to connect your applications to all your messages.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64e63b4da7d56667e90cc41d_api.svg)
#### Simple & Powerful API
Enveloop's API gives developers the power to wield control over the often complicated (and quite unenjoyable and difficult-to-master) world of sending emails and text. Along with ease of sending, Enveloop's API allows developers to remove configuration cruft from their codebase while increasing security, giving them simpler, more streamlined applications and the added benefit of not having to constantly monitor and update libraries to stay with changing standards.
#### Less Deploys
The less configuration your code base has, the more reliable your deployments become and the less you have to stress each time you release updates.Even better, as you move your email and text content to Enveloop, the less you have to deploy just to make minor content updates. 
#### Visual Sandbox
Along with previews and testing you have when building texts and emails, Enveloop gives you a visual Sandbox environment to test API calls from your application. You can easily see sets of senders as well as how the data passed would be rendered in a production environment, all from safe confines. 
## COMMUNICATION
## Communicate. Simple & Fast.
Sign up with Enveloop and you can send your first email message in less than a minute. We handle all the complexity so you don't have to waste time managing a backend provider. All you have to decide is what to say and when to say it.
![Checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64c81b77f0cf731e0bea21b8_check.svg)
#### Emails, SMS, & more!
Not only can you create and manage all your email message designs in Enveloop, you can do the same for all your SMS / MMS messages and send those from Enveloop as well.
![Checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64c81b77f0cf731e0bea21b8_check.svg)
#### Easy to send
Enveloop includes useful templates to get started fast. Plus, with one-click test messaging, a powerful sandbox environment, and all types of API code snippets included, sending your messages is practically effortless!
![Checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64c81b77f0cf731e0bea21b8_check.svg)
#### Centralized
All your message design and content is organized in one place, segmented out into the teams and projects you need. Easily invite in team members or your clients at no additional cost -- easing your workload.
![Checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64c81b77f0cf731e0bea21b8_check.svg)
#### BYOP (Provider)
Already have a messaging provider but looking for a better way to design and manage your messages? No problem! Along with easy sending via Enveloop, we integrate with all major message providers!
## Deliverability
## Deliverability is everything.
What good is a fast message that never gets to your user? SPF? DKIM? DMARC? You don't have to be an email protocol expert to use Enveloop. We handle the complexity and make sure you take all the right steps to maximize your inbox position.Even more, our powerful editor allows you to create emails that will work in all popular email clients and browsers. No more struggling with client or OS-specific workarounds. We have you covered!
![Shield with checkmark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64f1fb14337b09f32b191add_shield-check.svg)
Standards from the start.
![Open envelope with letter](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64f1fbbd2a35f4183ad3fa96_envelope-open-text.svg)
Email designs that work everywhere.
![Checklist icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64f1fb82d4dab2b32b79add8_list-check.svg)
Detailed logging of all sending events.
## TEAMS
## Team Empowerment
One of the biggest benefits of freeing your email and text messaging complexity from your codebase is adding your team to help. With Enveloop, it's easy to delegate. Add as many projects and team members as you need to be successful. It's all included!All the content you send out now has high visibility. You have confidence in what your users are seeing and how effective the messages are.
![Icon with two people and an arrow between them](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64f1fdf915ab491aaae9c6ee_team-15.svg)
#### Easy to delegate
Add in all the team members you need to engage your messaging efforts. Add clients, too!
![Icon with three users](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64de6654956bed99fa97f518_icons-01.svg)
#### Multiple teams and projects
Enveloop is all about teams. Add, at no additional cost, projects and teams as your needs grow -- safely separating your interests.
![Open eye icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6465316ba3b74d3985bdc341/64f1fe027d6477504d7847f9_team-14.svg)
#### High visibility
All the messages your applications send out, instead of being hidden in your code, are visible and available to you -- ensuring consistency and making it super-easy to update as you grow.
## Ready to give Enveloop a try?
[Get Started!](http://www.enveloop.com/<https:/app.enveloop.com/>)

**Introducing Enveloop**

Founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator Batch W20, Enveloop is a Birmingham, AL-based startup transforming the way we send messages through apps. Think of it as a simplified messaging API for developers—akin to what Prisma does for databases. 

**Core Mission**

Enveloop’s mission is straightforward: to allow you to design and send emails and texts from your app with a simple API. They handle the complexities of communication across various channels—making it easy and efficient for developers.

**Who They Are**

With a compact team of five, Enveloop is committed to building a powerful yet user-friendly platform. Their approach strips away the burdensome configurations and cumbersome libraries often associated with email and messaging systems. Instead, they offer robust templates and components that allow developers to focus more on building and less on boilerplate code.

**What They Offer**

At its core, Enveloop boasts a flexible API that places a high emphasis on developer experience. Here’s a quick rundown of what the platform provides:

- **Design Assistance**: Users can leverage pre-designed templates or create their own with a responsive UI, rich Markdown support, and Mustache syntax for dynamic content.
  
- **Simplified Communication**: Sending messages is a breeze. With one-click test messaging and centralized management for emails, SMS, and MMS, the platform ensures seamless communication.

- **Developer Empowerment**: Enveloop's API allows teams to reduce unnecessary code and simplify deployments. You can manage message design and content without the chaos of constantly changing libraries.

- **Collaboration Features**: It supports multiple teams and projects, enabling effortless delegation. You can invite team members or clients without additional costs, keeping all communications and designs organized in one place.

- **Deliverability Focus**: Enveloop doesn't just send messages; it ensures they land in the right inbox. The platform handles all the intricacies of email protocols, making sure your messages reach your audience effectively.

**Ready to Dive In?**

If you’re a developer looking to streamline your messaging workflow, Enveloop is a solid option. Their clean, intuitive interface and powerful API might just be the tool you need to take your communication processes to the next level. 

Check them out at [enveloop.com](http://www.enveloop.com) to get started or request a demo!
